text: Procópio Cardoso Neto (born March 21, 1939) is a Brazilian former football player and coach. He started his professional career at Renascença as a Center Back. Cardoso also played for Belo Horizonte rivals, Cruzeiro and Atlético Mineiro, São Paulo, Fluminense, Vitória and Palmeiras.http://br.sambafoot.com/jogadores/659_Procopio_Cardoso.html In a game of Cruzeiro against Santos for 1968 Taça Brasil Cardoso disputed a ball with Pelé and he had ruptured a tendon in his knee. He spent 5 years out of professional football, working a youth coach at Cruzeiro, returning at field just in 1973. As a manager, Cardoso managed Cruzeiro, Atlético Mineiro, Atlético Paranaense, Fluminense, Bahia and Internacional. == Honours == === Player === ; Atlético Mineiro * Campeonato Mineiro (2): 1962, 1963 ;Cruzeiro * Campeonato Mineiro (6): 1959, 1960, 1961, 1967, 1968, 1973 * Campeonato Brasileiro Série A (1): 1966 ; Fluminense * Campeonato Carioca (1): 1964 ; Palmeiras * Torneio Rio-São Paulo (1): 1965 === Como treinador === ; Atlético Mineiro * Copa Conmebol: 1992 * Campeonato Mineiro (3): 1978, 1979, 1980 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:São Paulo FC players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro players Category:Esporte Clube Vitória players Category:Fluminense FC players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro managers Category:Al-Arabi SC (Qatar) managers Category:Qatar national football team managers Category:Fluminense FC managers Category:Grêmio Foot- Ball Porto Alegrense managers Category:Ettifaq FC managers Category:Sport Club Internacional managers Category:Esporte Clube Bahia managers Category:Al-Nassr FC managers Category:América Futebol Clube (MG) managers Category:Al-Sharjah SCC managers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Brazilian football managers
title: Procópio Cardoso
